title: Gating Integrity Audit Report (GIAR)
description: The immutable, signed result of executing a Gating Integrity Check Manifest (GICM). This report determines RRP clearance status.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific audit execution.

manifest_id.description: The $id URI of the GICM used for this audit.

overall_status.description: The conclusive status regarding RRP clearance.

veto_source_id.description: If FAIL_CRITICAL_VETO, the check_id that caused the veto.

check_results.description: Detailed outcome for every prerequisite check listed in the manifest.

actual_value.description: The value retrieved from the component during the check execution.

signature.description: Cryptographic signature certifying the immutability and authenticity of the report.
